data.claim: Mem0 is a universal memory layer for AI agents with 47.2k GitHub stars, achieving +26% accuracy over OpenAI Memory on LOCOMO benchmark, 91% faster responses, and 90% lower token usage than full-context approaches.
data.snippet: +26% Accuracy over OpenAI Memory on the LOCOMO benchmark. 91% Faster Responses than full-context. 90% Lower Token Usage than full-context.
